mapper.select: SELECT ZoneSeq, Name, ASTEXT(Polygon) as polygon, isDel, TypeSeq, Code, StartTime, EndTime FROM illegal_zone where ZoneSeq = #{zoneSeq} and isDel = 0;
SELECT ZoneSeq, Name, ASTEXT(Polygon) as polygon, isDel, TypeSeq, Code, StartTime, EndTime FROM illegal_zone where Code = #{code} and isDel = 0;
SELECT ZoneSeq, Name, ASTEXT(Polygon) as polygon, isDel, TypeSeq, Code, StartTime, EndTime FROM illegal_zone where typeSeq = #{typeSeq} and isDel = 0;
SELECT ZoneSeq, Name, ASTEXT(Polygon) as polygon, isDel, TypeSeq, Code, StartTime, EndTime FROM illegal_zone where typeSeq = #{typeSeq} and Code = #{code} and isDel = 0;
SELECT ZoneSeq, Name, ASTEXT(Polygon) as polygon, isDel, TypeSeq, Code, StartTime, EndTime FROM illegal_zone where isDel = 0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO illegal_zone (Name, Polygon, isDel, TypeSeq, Code, StartTime, EndTime) VALUES (#{name}, POLYGONFROMTEXT(#{polygon}), #{isDel}, #{typeSeq}, #{code}, #{StartTime}, #{EndTime});
mapper.update: UPDATE illegal_zone SET TypeSeq = #{typeSeq}, StartTime =#{startTime}, EndTime =#{endTime} WHERE ZoneSeq = #{zoneSeq};
UPDATE illegal_zone SET isDel = true WHERE ZoneSeq = #{zoneSeq};
